summary: Anti-Aliasing, Anisotropic Filtering, SMAA, FXAA, SSAO, HDR, and a double Bloom Effect all at the same time in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=blue]THE ORGINAL AND MUCH DUPLICATED PPHYBRID IS BACK WITH ITS FINAL VERSION. IT WILL NO LONGER BE SUPPORTED OR WORKED ON. MAYBE WITH ENOUGH ENDORSMENTS I MAY START UP AGAIN.[/b][/color][/size]

[b][size=1][color=white]--[/color][/size][size=3][color=grey]ENBseries[/color][/size][size=5][color=white] -_- [/color][/size][size=3][color=grey]FXAA[/color][/size][size=5] -_- [/size][size=3][color=grey]SMAA[/color][/size][size=5][color=white] -_- [/color][/size][size=3][color=grey]Hybrid[/color][/size][size=1][color=white]--[/color][/b][/size][color=red]  * * *[/color][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQzKvaYosJY][size=4][color=white][u]Youtube Video Promo[/u][/color][/size][/url][color=red]* * *  [/color][size=3][color=grey] created by thenannymoh in [/color]FULL 1080P[/size]
[img=left]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/506172-1324178274.jpg[/img]
[size=1][b][color=red][u]- - - - - - - -*[/u][/color][color=white][u] If you like my work please endorse then vote.[/u][/color][color=red][u]*- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/u][/color][/b][/size]


[b][color=#F53636][u]ABOUT[/u]:[/color][/b]
This mod has created as a hybrid of ENBseries, FXAA and SMAA. When this is done it provides Anti-Aliasing, Anisotropic Filtering, SMAA, FXAA, SSAO, HDR, and a double Bloom Effect all at the same time in Skyrim. As well as FPS friendly Sharpening, Tonemaps, and Coloring done by FXAA.
[size=1][color=grey]Because this mod is no longer being supported i leave it up to the community to support each other with this mod. PPHybrid is NOT compatible with any other injector[/color][/size]

[b][color=#F53636][u]INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS[/u]:[/color][/b]
Then just un-RAR files into main Skyrim folder with tesV.exe not the data folder and enjoy.
[color=grey][size=1]Skyrim Main Folder Is Usually Located At:[/size][/color]
[size=1][color=grey]( C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim ) on 64Bit systems.[/color][/size]

[b][color=#F53636][u]YOUTUBE PROMO VIDEO[/u]:[/color][/b]
This Promo was created by the thenannymoh in Full 1080P. Go check out his other his amazing work located [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/thenannymoh?feature=watch]here[/url] or at the bottom of the page.

[center][youtube]cQzKvaYosJY[/youtube][/center]
[b][color=red][u]PERMISSIONS[/u]:[/color][/b]
[color=grey][size=1][b]I had to get special written permissions from both Jorge Jimenez (SMAA) and Andrej Dudenhefner (SMAA Injector) for use and distribution of this mod. I also had to get written permission from Boris Vorontsov (ENBseries) to distribute ENBseries on SkyrimNexus. I highly suggest to do the same. As a note SMAA is copy righted.[/b][/size][/color]

[b][color=#F53636][u]HOT KEYS[/u]:[/color][/b]
Not all hot keys will work the same in all versions of PPHybrid. Using the * key above the number 9 on your number pad will show FPS in all versions with ENBseries. Holding down Shift+Enter will bring up the in-game ENBseries config in PPH3. In all versions with FXAA pressing the Pause\\Break Key should enable or disable FXAA. This feature of FXAA Post Process Injector is known to be buggy and may not always work.

[b][color=#F53636][u]MOD CONTENTS[/u]:[/color][/b]
This mods contains the following mods. All link\'s are located at the bottom of the page.[list][size=1][*]      SES FXAA Wrapper (PPHybrid3 FINAL)
[*]      ENBseries 0132 (PPHybrid3 FINAL)
[*]      ENBseries 096 Patch 9 (PPHybrid 2.31 Final)
[*]      ENBseries 087 (PPHybrid 1.4 Final)
[*]      FXAA Post Process Injector
[*]      FXAA Post Process Injector Config Utility (PPHybrid 2.2 and above)[/list][/size]
[b][color=#F53636][u]CUSTOM SETTINGS[/u]:[/color][/b]
PPHybrid has a folder called PPHybridConfig that contains the FXAA and SMAA settings. FXAA is fully customizable. SMAA is limited and you can only choose from 1 preset option. I have included many FXAA presets as well. Only 1 FXAA and 1 SMAA preset can be used at one time. To use a different setting simply change a 0 to a 1 and a 1 to a 0. The default setting are at max of each. To use the included FXAA utility you have to enable it in the settings.

[b][color=#F53636][u]UNINSTALL OR UPGRADE[/u]:[/color][/b]
To Uninstall or Upgrade please remove any of the following files or folders if present. If upgrading please do this prior to upgrade in the exceptions of \"Quick Patches.\"[list][size=1][*]      (Folder) exes
[*]      (Folder) injFX_Shaders
[*]      (Folder) ORIGINAL README\'S
[*]      (Folder) PPHybrid
[*]      (Folder) PPHybridConfig
[*]      d3d9.dll
[*]      d3d9SMAA.dll
[*]      d3dx9PPH.dll
[*]      enbpatch.ini
[*]      enbseries.ini
[*]      enbeffect.fx
[*]      enbeffectprepass.fx
[*]      enbsunsprite.fx
[*]      enbsunsprite.tga
[*]      SHADER.fx
[*]      SMAA.fx
[*]      SMAA.h
[*]      effect.txt
[*]      FXAA_Tool.exe[/list][/size][color=grey][size=1]Skyrim Main Folder Is Usually Located At:[/size][/color]
[size=1][color=grey]( C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim ) on 64Bit systems.[/color][/size]


[center][img=center]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/2662-1-1324436805.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=1][center][b][color=#F53636]CREDITS, IF LINKS DON\'T WORK PLEASE COPY AND PASTE THEM INTO YOU BROWSER ADDRESS BAR:[/color][/b]

SMAA, Sub-Pixel Morphological Anti-Aliasing
[url=http://www.iryoku.com/smaa]SMAA by Jorge Jimenez, Belen Masia, Jose I. Echevarria, Fernando Navarro, Diego Gutierrez[/url]   -   http://www.iryoku.com/smaa/
[url=https://github.com/iryoku/smaa]SMAA Injector by Andrej Dudenhefner[/url]   -   https://github.com/iryoku/smaa

This MOD Contains and Credits Go To:
[url=http://www.enbdev.com]ENBSeries by Boris Vorontsov[/url]   -   http://www.enbdev.com

And its FXAA Config Utility Included by Retspadez
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2692]HD Cinematic Fire Effects by Ichibu[/url]   -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2692
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=822]SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS by Tapioks and Xorchan[/url]   -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=822

Superdurper Extra Thankz To:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/thenannymoh?feature=watch]thenannymoh[/url] - http://www.youtube.com/user/thenannymoh?feature=watch
Thank You Very Much For This Beautiful YouTube Video Promo
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQzKvaYosJY]Youtube Video Promo[/url] - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQzKvaYosJY
[/size][/center]

[b][color=#F53636][u]CHANGE LOG[/u]:[/color][/b]
[color=FA5252][size=1]PPHybrid3 FINAL[/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Final Version
[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1]2.31[/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Added Support for Skyrim 1.3.1 Patch[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1]2.3[/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Added Support for 4GB Skyrim 1.5
[*]      Fixed SMAA Bug
[*]      Brought Back More Sharpening[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1]2.2[/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Made Compatible with no AA By Default
[*]      Disabled AA in ENBseries By Default
[*]      FXAA Non AA Blur Set to Minimum
[*]      Added FXAA Config Utility
[*]      Made Compatible With FXAA Config Utility
[*]      Made Easier To Use Custom injFX_Settings.h
[*]      Brought Back Stronger Reflections
[*]      Fixed Over Blue Shift
[*]      Fixed Shadow Bug[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1]2.1[/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Post \"Release Candidate\" Download
[*]      Added PPHybrid 2.1 (NO ENBseries) Version to download
[*]      Added PPHybrid 2.1 (NO FXAA) Version to download
[*]      Added PPHybrid 2.1 (NO SMAA) Version to download
[*]      Added PPHybrid 3.0 Alpha Preview to downloads
[*]      Added Original FXAA PPInjector 1.3 Fixes for PPHybrid 2.1 as a download
[*]      Updated Screenshots Download[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1][b]1.4 FINAL[/b][/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Added PPHybrid 1.4 Final (Lighter Version) to downloads
[*]      Added PPHybrid 1.4 Final (NO ENBseries 087) Version to downloads
[*]      More Compatibility Fixes
[*]      Fixed Daytime Over Luma
[*]      Brought Back A Little Daytime Contrast
[*]      Added PPHybrid 2.0 RC\'s to downloads
[*]      Added Original FXAA PPInjector 1.3 as a download
[*]      Added Original FXAA PPInjector 1.3 Fixes for PPHybrid 1.4 Final as a download
[*]      Removed Previous Versions[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1][b]1.31[/b][/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Removed Second FPS Counter
[*]      Updated Hardware Requirements
[*]      Added PPHybrid 2.0 Beta to downloads[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1][b]1.3[/b][/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Fixed Most Compatibility Issues
[*]      Fixed Over Contrast
[*]      Toned Down Double Bloom Effect
[*]      Fixed Tone Map Filter Compatibility
[*]      Added Screens[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1][b]1.2[/b][/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Changed name from ENBseries and FXAA Injector Hybrid to PPHybrid
[*]      Fixed daytime over Whitening
[*]      Added slight Saturation
[*]      Added Requirements
[*]      Updated Screenshot download to include JPG\'s and original BMP\'s[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1][b]1.1[/b][/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Changed Tone Map Filter to not be loaded at all
[*]      Added Original FXAA Injectors 1.3 as a download
[*]      Added Original Skyrim .BMP\'s as a download[/list][/size]
[color=FA5252][size=1]1.0[/size][/color][list][size=1][*]      Initial Post-Beta Release[/list][/size]
